contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 10, 2017 D Darwen March and Hymn Tune Contest
Darwen March and Hymn Tune Contest 0 March & Hymn Contest (Separate Points)
darwen-march-and-hymn-tune-contest
Market Square, Darwen, Lancashire March Placing + Hymn Placing = Total Points (In the event of a tie, the March placings take precedent)
Ashton-Under-Lyne - Overall Winners, £700 Marsden - Overall 2nd Place, £400 Eccleston - Overall 3rd Place, £300
Best Soloist - Andy Pullin (Solo Cornet, Eccleston) Youngest Player - Poppy Abbott (Brindle)
Horwich R.M.I - Winners of 2nd Section, £250 Besses Boys - 2nd Place 2nd Section, £150
Greenalls - Winners of 3rd Section, £250 Hawk Green - 2nd place 3rd Section, £150
Brindle - Winners of 4th Section, £250 Lostock Hall - 2nd Place 4th Section, £150
Sept. 7, 2017, 12:10 p.m. Sept. 14, 2017, 9:21 a.m.
1 Ashton Band Philip Chalk
2 Marsden Silver Prize Band Alan Widdop
3 Eccleston Brass John Wood
4 Horwich R.M.I. Matthew Ryan
5 Greenalls Band Danny Lowery
6 Hawk Green (Marple) Band Neil Hewson
7 Freckleton Band Paul Dalton
8 Besses Boys Band James Holt
9 Bolton (Hoover) Band Craig Mann
10 Farnworth and Walkden Band Matt Shaw
11 Brindle Band Keith Richmond
12 Lostock Hall Memorial Band David Houghton
13 Skelmersdale Prize Band James Hall
14 Rivington and Adlington Band Malcolm Wilson
Withdrawn Besses o' th' Barn Trevor Halliwell
Withdrawn Middleton Band Les Webb
